articles.title: Argentina soybean sales stall near 72% of current harvest
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 15 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers' soybean sales inched up last week, reaching 72.2% of the 2021/22 harvest of the crop, data from the Agriculture Ministry showed on Tuesday, slightly behind the 74.2% sold at the same point last year.Argentina is the world's top exporter of processed soy meal and soybean oil, an important input for animal feed. articles.title: Soccer-Messi eager to enjoy World Cup, says Argentina coach Scaloni
articles.description:
Argentina forward Lionel Messi is relishing the build-up to the Qatar World Cup, head coach Lionel Scaloni said on Tuesday as he prepares the team for their warm-up clash with the United Arab Emirates in Abu Dhabi.
eager to enjoy the World Cup," Scaloni told reporters ahead of Wednesday's game.

articles.title: Football isn’t just Kerala, Bengal, Goa … it’s also Kolhapur
articles.description: If you thought the World Cup fever is at peak only in the traditional hubs and sports-bars in big cities, you would be surprised what football means to a Maharashtra city and their very own teams that wear Brazil and Argentina colours.
articles.content:
